The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 August is 281,457 (500 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 August, there were 5,981 new confirmed cases (10.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 August, there were 6,662 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 10% (681 fewer cases).
